description:
The LEGO® Fun Pack includes:
- LEGO® Tails Skin
- LEGO® Amy Skin
- LEGO® Knuckles Skin
- Additional LEGO® Stages for Battle Mode

Note: This content is also included as part of the Deluxe Edition and Digital Deluxe Upgrade featuring LEGO®. Please take care not to make duplicate purchases.
name: LEGO® Fun Pack
